title: Entire Computer Consistently Freezes When Attempting To Open League
body:
I can't provide screenshots or anything, because my computer freezes, but this is the series of events that occurred to the best of my memory.

Last night, I was playing on LAN (leveling up an account so I can play with my friend who lives in Mexico) and just as the game ended, and the enemy nexus would explode, my computer froze. Now, I've had this happen before, and it was fixed by just forcing my computer off by holding the power button. But, after restarting, I let my computer do it's boot-up thing, and I go to open the league client. Before the updater/bootstrapper/client itself could open, everything freezes. 

I have I/OBit and Advanced System Care (related products), and ASC gives me a little desktop gauge of how much Ram, CPU, and Disk Space (Disk something, I can't remember offhand) are being used at the moment. After trying to open the league client, my CPU usage goes from its average of 30-40%, down to 5-10%, and nothing responds. Can't open Task Manager with Ctrl+Alt+Del, can't open a browser to Google what's going on, but I can still watch the CPU fluctuate between two small numbers, and hopelessly click on things. The only way to escape this is to force shut down my computer.

I will note that this only happens when opening league, and every single time since that original crash.

replies.body:
Thank you for the response, I'll be getting to this right away.

Yes, it's a PC. It could be either hardware or drivers; I haven't updated drivers recently, and my harddrive wants to die, but I'm hoping if it's either it's the drivers because I can't afford to replace the HD right now

Are you on a PC?  It sounds like there might be a hardware or driver failure with your PC and not necessarily League, but I can't really say for sure.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, which will give us more context.  Attach those logs to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can review it and get back to you individually.  We'll reply back to your ticket as soon as we can!
